text.autoconfig.compass3d.title: Simple Shulker Preview
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.disable: Disables the mod so that overlay icons are not displayed.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.display: Set which item in the shulker should be displayed.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.groupEn: Group enchanted items separately from un-enchanted items.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.stacked: Scale of the icon on stacked shulkers to prevent overlap with stack count.
Horizontal offset of the icon on stacked shulkers to prevent overlap with stack count.
Vertical offset of the icon on stacked shulkers to prevent overlap with stack count.
In/out offset of the icon on stacked shulkers to prevent overlap with stack count.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.support: Treats custom heads separately from the minecraft:player_head
Displays the item inside recursively stored shulker boxes
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.transla: The horizontal offset of the icon, from left to right.
The vertical offset of the icon, from top to bottom.
In/out offset. Use when other mods cover / are covered by this.
